Key Match Events: Rashid Khan and Fazalhaq Farooqi took 3 wickets each
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and opted to bat first in their Super-8 match on Thursday against Afghanistan in Group 1 at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados.
One change for India as Kuldeep Yadav comes in for Mohammed Siraj. For Afghanistan, Karim Janat goes out as Hazratullah Zazai comes in.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day.
